sn40.4:1.4: ‘idha bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
sn40.4:1.6: So khvaham, avuso, sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharami.
sn40.4:1.7: Tassa mayham, avuso, imina viharena viharato sukhasahagata sannamanasikara samudacaranti.
sn40.4:2.1: Atha kho mam, avuso, bhagava iddhiya upasankamitva etadavoca:
sn40.4:2.3: Ma, brahmana, catuttham jhanam pamado, catutthe jhane cittam santhapehi, catutthe jhane cittam ekodim karohi, catutthe jhane cittam samadaha’ti.
sn40.4:2.4: So khvaham, avuso, aparena samayena sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja vihasim.
sn40.4:2.5: Yanhi tam, avuso, samma vadamano vadeyya …pe… mahabhinnatam patto”ti.
